name: Friday Night Multiplayer
description:
In Friday Night Multiplayer, you can play either as the survivors or the killer, two very different experiences that completely change how you approach the game. As the killer, your mission is simple: kill all the survivors before they escape. To do so, you have various special skills and power-ups to help you hunt down and kill each of your victims.

Playing as the survivors, on the other hand, is much more complicated, because there's nothing to help you except your ability to hide. You'll have to work as a team if you want to get out alive, escaping in one of four ways: calling the police, fixing a broken car, killing the killer, or opening the door of the room where you're trapped. To unlock each of these options, you'll have to complete a series of tasks in the right order.

Every time you win, you earn coins that you can invest in unlocking new skins for both the survivors and the killers.

At the moment, there aren't too many players on the servers, so you'll need to get a group of friends together if you want to really enjoy Friday Night Multiplayer and everything it has to offer.
